caption.p: Synthetic routes to compounds 16–22, 24, 25, 28 and 29. Reagents and Conditions : (a) n-BuLi, DME, ethyl 2-(diethoxyphosphoryl)-3-(p-tolyl)propanoate (2), RT-90 °C; 63%; (b) LiOH, THF/MeOH/H 2O, 100 °C; 87%; (c) HOBt, DIPEA, EDC.HCl, DMF, R 1R 2NH; 34–60%; (d) TEA, DPPA, t-BuOH, RT, 50%; (e) TFA, DCM, RT;100%; (f) TEA, RSO 2Cl; −15 °C; 50–61%. (g) NaH, DME, BnBr, RT-60 °C, 90%; (h) n-BuLi, DME, Phoxirane, RT-90 °C, 25%; (i) NaN 3, TEA, DMFA, 130 °C, 46%.
